articles.title: Cerundolo upsets Canada's Auger-Aliassime in Miami Open third round
articles.description: MIAMI — Montreal's Felix Auger-Aliassime is out of the Miami Open after being upset 6-2, 7-5 in a third-round match with Argentina's Francisco Cerundolo.
articles.content:

articles.title: Emi Martinez makes Lionel Messi swap claim as Argentina conversation revealed
articles.description: Latest Aston Villa news from BirminghamLive as goalkeeper Emi Martinez talks about playing with Lionel Messi and what the legendary player told him while on international duty with Argentina
articles.content:
Aston Villa goalkeeper Emi Martinez has revealed that Lionel Messi would swap all seven of his Ballon d'Or awards for one Copa America winners' medal.
Messi told Martinez as much while the duo were on international duty with Argentina, saying success... [1643 chars]

articles.title: Teenager cycles more than 32,000km from Alaska to Argentina in journey of a lifetime
articles.description: Over the course of nearly one and a half years, teenage cyclist Liam Garner rode through 14 countries, covering more than 32,000km in the journey of a lifetime. Read more at straitstimes.com.
